Package org.crsh.command

Interface Summary
CommandContext<P> The command context provides the services for invoking a command.
CommandInvoker<C,P> A command invoker is a filter for a CommandContext kind of consumer.
InvocationContext<P>  
RuntimeContext The minimum set of services that a command needs for executing properly: a session map an attribute map
ShellCommand A shell command.
